hrudaya wasthuwa gahenuye widyuthaya upayogi kara ganiminiga mema widyuthaya kramanukulawa nishpadanaya karanuye dakunu karnikawe ihalin athi wishesha widyuth kosha wani saila waliniga ema saila pihiti sthanayata hruth karnika gataya yayi kiyanu labegamema hruth karnika gatayen nipadawena widyuthaya hrudaye sesu pradesha kara gaman karanuye wishesha widyuth paripathayak margayeniga meya hrudaye sannayaka paddhathiya lesa handinweyigamema snnayaka paddhathiya dige kramanukulawa gaman karana widyuthaya mangin samanya hruda spandanaya athi wega eya eegasigajiga rekhanayaka mese satahan wegaathamwita sannayaka paddhathiye paribahira sthanayaka widyuthaya amuthuwen nishpadanaya wi hruda spandanaya akramika bawata path wegahruda spandana wegayahruda spandanaya itha sighra wuwahoth :miga 160ta wadi-mese spandanaya wadi wuwoth papuwe gasma rogiyata danega eya adu wi yana thuru hansi wi sitiya yuthuyagaitha manda wuwahoth :miga60ta adu-hruda spandanaya itha adu wu witala as andiriwimala klanthayala sihi nathi wima athi wegaewita prathamadharayak washayen pathali thalayaka :udaga polowakala andak mathupita- diga wi dethun warak waren kassak athi kala yuthuyagapapuwe gasmasamanyayen minis hadawatha winadiyakata 60-80 warayak kramanukulawa gahemin pawathiga me samanya gasma minisata danenne nathagabiya wu witekadi kalabala wu witeka di hrudaye gasma samanyayata wada prabala weyiga ese wiparitha wu wita pamanak hadawathe gasma wignyanayata hangeyiga gasmak athi bawak danenne ewita pamanigaboho awasthawanhi me papuwe gasma rogi thaththwayak pennum nokaranna wu samanya sansiddhiyakigaatham awasthawaladi pamanak papuwe gasma shariraye ho hrudaye ho athi rogayaka ek anshayak nirupanaya karana roga lakshanayakigaebadu roga samaharak namwayu gedi hethuwen athi wana wisha wimahrudaya wasthuwa idimimamadyasara wishawimadadi manasika asahanaya yana mewayagapapuwe gasma witakadi gassim :ekakata ra dekakata- pamanak sima wega atham witekadi miniththu kihipayak ho paya kihipayak ho pura akhandawa sighra gasma pawathiga me kawara aakaraye gasmak wuwada nawatha nawathath athi wimata prawanathawak athagaaushadha mangin prathikara karanu labanne bhayanaka :darunu- gasma pamanakiga boho gasma jiwitha haniyata thudu nodena bawin dirghakalina aushadha prathikaraya mangin yatapath kirimata waidyawaru mali wethiga rogiya me amuthu gasma nisa asahanayata path wuwahoth pamanak aushadha mangin gasma yatapath karanu labegagasma athi rogiya da pahatha sandahan karunu walin walaki sitiya yuthuyagaï¬ itha thada kahatata peru the panayaï¬ itha thada kahatata peru kopi panaya:mehi itha kahatata yayi kiyana ladde kiri musu numusu bawa salaka nowega the ho kopi ho kudu swalpayak dama digu kalayak thambennata ida dun kala therakopi diyaraya itha thada paha ganwega adu kahata pahak labanu sandaha the rakopi kudu the handi ekak pamana dama winadi deka thunak pamanak thambennata harinnaga-ï¬ kola wargaye bimaï¬ kassata semata pinasata adumata batahira beheth kramaye denu labana aushadha pethi ha pani wargaï¬ madyasaraya ra witamin :pani-la arishta- madyasaraya athagaï¬ manasika asahanayaï¬ atham prathijiwaka aushadha :erithromayisin wisheshayiga-

eya pakisthana ithihasaye maranthikama guwan wyasanayayi. 2012 di pakisthanaye bhoja eyar aayathanayata ayath boyin 737-200 yanaya rawalpindi godabimata langa wime di ayahapath kalagunaya hethuwen anathurata pathwimen magin 121 deneku saha karya mandalaya haya deneku jiwithakshayata pathwiya.

mema niwedanaya nikuth karana ladde, juni 16da janadhipathi rajapaksha maha bankuwe ihala niladharin ohuge karyalayata kandawa, mita pera ohu dun niyoga kriyathmaka no kirima gana banawadimen anathuru wa ya.
akka ehema kiyaddi mage hitha salenna gaththa.
me mata hithuna widiha...
thawa da lankika damila janaya wadath samanakam dakwanne sihalunta bawa ohuge dahasayi.
shri lankawa mul inimedi warak lakunu 75kata kadulu dekak pamana dawi prabala thaththwayaka pasuwuwath dhanushka gunathilaka (29) saha kusal mendis (22) dawiyamen inima kadawatini.
ohu sanasum susumak heluwaya.. ape plan eke idam kathawak thibune nane rakhitha.. sithumini siya aprasadaya yatapath kara ganimata weradaramin wimasuwaya..

shrilanipaye 16 ta erehiwa wishwasabhangayak gena aawoth parajaya karanawa -duminda pasugiyada agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahathata ha rajayata erehiwa eekabaddha wipakshaya gena aa wishwasabhanga yojanawata pakshawa chandaya bhawitha kala shrilanka nidahas paksha kabinat, rajya saha niyojya amathiwarun 16 denata erehiwa eksath jathika pakshayen wishwasabhangayak gena aawoth ehidi shrilanipaye mathi amathiwarun aaraksha karaganima wenuwen peni sitina bawa shri.la.ni.pa maha lekam, krushikarma amathya duminda disanayaka mahatha pawasiya.
wada kotiyak thibbath yanna epayi.

aithihasika yugayaka lankeya pawula, paudgalika depala saha rajaya gana pamanak nowa sthrithwaya, lingikathwaya pilibanda nuthana sankalpiya chiththa rupa deshapalanikawa galapa hate dashakaya aarambayedima kawi liwiya haki iwak thibu nawagaththegama sayiman namathi kawiyawa awan halakadi ma handuna gaththe eseya. 2016 agosthu 12 sthriya lingikathwaya saha grahacharaya (mara mathaka) sanrakshana satahan mara pada (14)

aagamwadi wata pitawak sahithawa athi dadi wuna pudgalayeku bohowita buddhiyen wimasa kriya karanne natha.owun jiwath wanne aagama wisin owunta penwa athi manahkalpitha mano lokayakaya.therena bhashawen kiyanawanam bahutharayak aagam wala minisun modayoya.eyata hondama udaharanayak lesa nikanma nikan chithrapata naluwaku wana rajini kanth dakunu indiyawedi dewiyeku bawata path wanne ema janayage nodanuwath kama nisaya.owun sithanne chithra patiye adangu siyalu darshana wala adala charithayata athi adhi manushika hakiyawan saba jiwithayeda ema naluwa sathuwana bawaya.owun prachanda wanneda owunge aagama magin owunta uganwa athi de nisaya.hindu dewi kenek prasiddhiye paraka gaman kalahoth ohuwa ath adanguwata gena aduma tharame awurudu dekakata wath ohuwa sirageta yawimata tharama awi aayudha ohu sathuwa atha.demala prachanda wanne ee nisaya.hethuwak uwamana natha.kawuru ho modayekuge usiganwima uwamanawatath wada pramanawathya.
